metadata.description: An outline consisting of headings and short bullet-point notes
metadata.author: Project Athena Team

sections.name: Title
sections.prompt: Create a short title for this lecture. Only respond with a title. Do not use quotes. Use ## heading markdown. Include a markdown divider at the end '---'

children.name: Heading
children.prompt: Generate a short title to describe this part of the lecture. Include a single emoji at the start of the title. Only respond with a title. Do not use quotes. Do not label it. Use #### heading markdown.

children.name: Key Points
children.prompt: Extract the most essential facts and arguments in bullet point format. Bold key terms and concepts. Use markdown: bold, bullet points "- ", indented points "   - ", and double indented points "      - " for legibility. Make each line short. Use markdown bold for legibility **bold**. Be thorough.
